title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.9 - Prohibition of certain solicitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.9 - Prohibition of certain solicitations

State Regulations

No person making a solicitation which is subject to this Part shall solicit any undated or post dated proxy or any proxy which provides that it shall be deemed to be dated as of any date subsequent to the date on which it is signed by the stockholder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
10.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
